product_name: Saris Freedom SuperClamp 2 Hitch Rack - 2 Bike
long_description: Designed to fit a wide range of bicycles without touching the frames, the Saris Freedom SuperClamp 2 Hitch Rack uses an easy-to-reach low tray height to haul 2 bikes without fuss.
short_description: Designed to fit a wide range of bicycles without touching the frames, the Saris Freedom SuperClamp 2 Hitch Rack uses an easy-to-reach low tray height to haul 2 bikes without fuss.
